title: Identifying components of H2 and NO reaction

content.question: The proposed mechanism for a reaction involves the three elementary steps represented by the particle models shown above. On the basis of this information, which of the following models represents an intermediate in the overall reaction?

choices.label: The figure presents a black circle connected to a gray circle.
The figure shows two white circles connected to each other.
The figure presents one black circle connected to 2 white circles.
The figure presents a gray circle connected to a gray circle, which is connected to a black circle.

content.answer: The figure presents a gray circle connected to a gray circle, which is connected to a black circle.

skill.text: 1.B: Describe the components of and quantitative information from models and representations that illustrate both particulate-level and macroscopic- level properties.
